name: Ghost Stories (itch)
description:
Buried deep within the earth within the tomb of the great Pharaoh Aketentamen; within the very sarcophagus of that heretical madman; clutched at his breast was a set of scrolls that detailed a story so impossibly real yet horrifyingly true, an insight into the mad workings of creatures far beyond our mortal understanding. The Apocryphal Apocrypha. They say that once discovered, it drove the leading archaeologist and the entire country of Egypt into insanity. And now, a hundred years later it is now ready to be unveiled again.

This is... not that story. 

Ghost Stories is about you. 

You work at a graveyard. It is your first night on the job. What could possibly go wrong?
